nodes.body: {!header} June kicked off with nine submissions to the Spring Game Jam, and there has been plenty of other exciting news throughout the month! Here's your latest RoundUp!

{🎮 releases} Ludicrousda3ve released [_Operation: Reaper Deathmatch Pack 1_](https://mods.bethesda.net/en/doom_doomii/details/fdf1c2b3-34ce-4142-8834-4fafafaa8c8f/Operation__Reaper_Deathmatch_Pack__1) for Doom + Doom 2! As a unique twist, some maps include optional constrained monsters used as NPC turrets to discourage camping.
{🧑‍💻 dev updates} Fairlii finished a game after learning development for 7 years - [here's what they learned in video format](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QOpxQCDcDFY&feature=youtu.be)!

{🧑‍💻 dev updates} Kris Truitt added [sweet jagged borders](https://bsky.app/profile/kristruitt.bsky.social/post/3lqne5ki3o22r) to his upcoming game _Mansion of a Million Monsters_, as well as ["OUCH! OOF! UGH!"](https://bsky.app/profile/kristruitt.bsky.social/post/3lrdpcyskas2n) sfx popups!

{🕹️ game jam releases} Seth Coster made [_Refl3ct_](https://bscotchseth.itch.io/refl3ct), a password memorization game, in 10 hours for the Spring Game Jam. Instead of traditional artwork, it uses only typed characters!

{🕹️ game jam releases} Axol Studio released _[Fish & Chips](https://axolstudio.itch.io/fish-n-chips)_, a game made than less than 10 days for the STL Spring Game Jam. Match the Sword cards to remove your opponent's chips, match the hearts to earn chips!

{🕹️ game jam releases} The STL Spring Game Jam Team with Cheezy-Z, s00bly, neitherworld, sabrex15, and Jovonka Johnson created the Unreal Engine game _[Henry Hart & The Puzzle Piece Killer](https://neitherworld.itch.io/henry-hart-the-puzzle-piece-killer)_. Collect evidence to uncover who the killer is!

{🕹️ game jam releases} The STL Spring Game Jam Team with LucyThePirate, Walpang, dorivy, and Miniscule Entertainment created a local versus game, [_Birds of a Feather_](https://lucythepirate.itch.io/birds-of-a-feather), in which each previous round is remembered and played with the concurrent round!

{🕹️ game jam releases} Coopdeloop created the game [_Not Forgotten_](https://coopdeloop.itch.io/not-forgotten) in 10 days for the STL Spring Game Jam! As a brain worker, recover your person's memories and assemble them together.

{🕹️ game jam releases} Chris Taylor and Kit Thomas made [_Neuronaut_](https://shredderct.itch.io/neuronaut) in 10 days for the STL Spring Game Jam! Traverse a spherical platformer and remove all your mental blocks!

{🕹️ game jam releases} Sharpshot124 and PrincessLilith made [_CraftCraft_](https://sharpshot124.itch.io/craftcraft) as part of the STL Spring Game Jam over ten days! You are not the main character - you are the Hero's squire. Manage the Hero's inventory quickly and efficiently... or else.

{🕹️ game jam releases} SimplePixelGames made [_Escape the Cave_](https://simplepixelgamesllc.itch.io/escape-the-cave) as part of the Spring Game Jam! Escape the cave. Use arrow keys to move. Remember which doors lead to death and which did not, and eventually you'll find your way out.

{🕹️ game jam releases} The STL Spring Game Jam Team with azeTrom, DoodleDupe, sxtempu, and Dorian released [_Next Aisle Over_](https://doodledupe.itch.io/next-aisle-over), a sandbox, physics-based puzzle platformer where you deliver items to eight different customers.

{🎮 releases} Alex Dollar has been modding Minecraft with [_Better Beacon Effects_](https://modrinth.com/mod/better-beacon-effects), where placing different blocks around the beacon will alter the way it looks with custom shaders!

{🎮 releases} [_Grandma, No!_](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2362680/Grandma_No/) released on Steam! Step into Grandma’s slippers and wreak havoc in this physics-driven comedy. Fat Bard brought local jazz musicians in on the music, and went full cartoon mode with the sound design! Pick up the soundtrack on [Bandcamp](https://fatbard.bandcamp.com/album/grandma-no)!

{📅 events} The [_Chicago Indie Game Showcase_](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/indiecitygames/chicago-indie-game-showcase/description), a one-day convention featuring independent games from Chicago and the greater Midwest, was fully funded! The event takes place on September 6th at the Hairpin Arts Center. Many of our community members are going via train and we would love to have more join us! DM Neitherworld on discord for more info.

{🎮 releases} meepalasheep showcased [_Orphans of Providence_](https://meepalasheep.itch.io/orphans-of-providence), a first-person RPG prototype inspired by Fallout: New Vegas that will serve as the basis for their next big game!

{🎮 releases} meepalasheep also showcased a demo for [_Ginger Snap_](https://meepalasheep.itch.io/gingersnap-demo)! It's an n64 inspired platformer with an elemental combo system, like Kirby 64 but 3d!
{📢 news} The [SAG-AFTRA Video Game Strike](https://www.sagaftra.org/sag-aftra-video-game-strike-suspended-noon-pt-today) was suspended on June 11th, as a tentative agreement has been reached!

{📢 news} The Nintendo Switch 2 sets record, selling [over 3.5 million units](https://www.nintendo.com/us/whatsnew/nintendo-switch-2-sets-record-selling-over-3-5-million-units-globally-in-first-four-days/) globally in first four days, but [physical third-party game sales reportedly "very low"](https://hitmarker.net/news/switch-2-physical-third-party-game-sales-reportedly-very-low-following-huge-console-launch-3046496)
{🎶 music} Fat Bard shared a throwback to the first song they worked on for [_Cross Blitz_](https://bsky.app/profile/fatbard.com/post/3lrxlsbz2xa2y)!
{📢 news} Colorgrave is launching a Kickstarter for [_Claire a la Mode_](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/colorgrave/claire-a-la-mode), a retro arcade style platforming adventure!

{📢 news} [_Mr. Run and Jump_](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2132540/Mr_Run_and_Jump/) by Graphite Lab is part of the Steam Summer Sale! Venture through a dazzling and dangerous world, dodging countless enemies and conquering hundreds of fierce platforming challenges to save the day!

{🎮 releases} Colorgrave released [_April Grove_](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3622260/April_Grove/) on Steam! Undertake your new job as a forester in a mystic and peaceful wood. Chop, gather, level up and unravel the expansive forest and its splendor at your own pace, one log at a time!

{🧑‍💻 dev updates} Cheezy-Z is prototyping a [visual novel style dialog system](https://bsky.app/profile/cheezy.bsky.social/post/3lss3zmlxhs2u) in Unreal Engine 5, using a combination of open source plugins SUDS and FlowGraph!
{🧑‍💻 dev updates} Wungun showcased his Unreal Engine 5 rendered [cinematics](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zyrDHrj4XFk)
{📚 resources} [3D Model to Sprite Pipeline](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3PVnKZr0x3o), a la Donkey Kong Country
{📚 resources} How Bloober Team [Turns Silence Into Fear](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KdXbYYioUUY) in the new Silent Hill 2 Remake

{📢 news} The [STL Video Game Music Orchestra](https://www.instagram.com/stlvgm) is currently accepting audition submissions for their 2025-2026 season! For more details, please email Jovi at stlvgmo@gmail.com and send in your materials before **August 1st**.
{🎶 music} Tangential Cold released [_Adore Ian Lean_](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0zwSQZZdwO0), Created in Reason Studio v11
{📚 resources} Give this Youtuber 14-Minutes, and He'll [10x Your Music Production Skills](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NZlUwgMWwIs)
{🎶 music} Dorian K released [_Shopping Spree_](https://soundcloud.com/dorian_kavadlo/shopping-spree-next-aisle-over), the music made over 10 days for Next Aisle Over!

{📅 events} The first event of the Science Center Up Late series is [Experience Sound](https://www.slsc.org/event/up-late-experience-sound/)! From music to nature, this event will explore the science and technology behind sound and music on July 19th from 6:00pm-10:00pm!

{📅 events} St. Louis Public Library’s [Summer Library Game Jam](https://slpl.bibliocommons.com/events/6822421ecaf0578ed11cf418) will take place on July 26th for a quick one day game jam starting at 10:00am, with a [showcase on the 27th](https://slpl.bibliocommons.com/events/6822421ecaf0578ed11cf419) starting at 2:00PM! Check our Upcoming Events for a series of Educational talks leading up to this event!

{📅 events} [MoGameCon](https://www.mogamecon.com/), Missouri's largest videogame convention, is on Saturday. July 26th, from 11:00am - 6:00 pm. We will be there with demos of games made by members of our community! If you have a game you want us to show off for you, [fill out this form](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfmG3YeRqL0HYdJfT4CJNvNXrYQry4lRntCRaTrnCjtdKqq9Q/viewform)! We can't wait to see you there!

{🎮 releases} Fairlii's first commercial game, [_Leaflup's Candy Hunt_](https://fairlii.itch.io/leaflups-candy-hunt) releases on July 12th! Check out the [annoucement trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yQyjk1uw6Lw)!
{🎮 releases} Isabelle released the [_Puppy Console_](https://github.com/puppy-tools/puppy-console), a console plugin for godot 4.4!

{🎮 releases} Goofy Gourd Studios showcased [_Ducks in a Row_](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2808260/Ducks_in_a_Row/), a super cute puzzler, and [_Storms Harvest_](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2593140/Storms_Harvest/?curator_clanid=44781149), a 2D retro-style ghost harvesting game!

{🎮 releases} Tangential Cold Studios released a small puzzle game called [_Constellation Connection_](https://tangentialcold.itch.io/constellation-connection)! Connect the stars to create the given constellations. Works great on mobile.

events.title: July GameDev Social!
events.description:
Come chat with fellow creators about making, playing, and admiring games! Talk about your game ideas and get inspired! Make friends and find collaborators. 

For full details, including the address, and to RSVP see: https://www.meetup.com/st-louis-game-developers/events/307236091
events.location: Dirty 20 Bar - 14051 Manchester Rd - Ballwin, MO, us

events.title: Making Narrative Games with Twine- Kelsey Watkins
events.description:
Kelsey Watkins will be leading a class on Making Narrative Games with Twine on July 15th at 6:00pm. Learn how to use Twine to create games where players choose what happens next - no coding experience required!

This is part of a series of educational events leading up to the St. Louis Public Library’s Summer Library Game Jam on July 26th!
events.location: St. Louis Public Library - Central Library, 1301 Olive St, St. Louis, MO 63103, USA

events.title: Art Principles for Games- Brendan Steppig
events.description:
Looloopaa will be teaching a class on Art Principles for Games on July 16th at 6:00pm! Learn about color, shape, composition, and how to create characters and environments that bring your game world to life!

This is part of a series of educational events leading up to the St. Louis Public Library’s Summer Library Game Jam on July 26th!
events.location: St. Louis Public Library - Central Library, 1301 Olive St, St. Louis, MO 63103, USA

events.title: Simple Audio Tools for Games- Lazarus Richardson
events.description:
Lazarus D. Richardson will be demonstrating Simple Audio Tools for Games on July 24th at 6:00pm. Learn how to create sound effects and music that bring games to life!

This is part of a series of educational events leading up to the St. Louis Public Library’s Summer Library Game Jam on July 26th!
